hadith.chapter: The Book Pertaining to the Excellent Qualities of the Holy Prophet (may Peace be upon them) and His - كتاب الفضائل
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثنيه محمد بن حاتم، حدثنا ابن مهدي، حدثنا سليم، بهذا الإسناد مثله وقال بدل أتمها أحسنها ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: This hadith has been narrated through another chain of transmitters but with a slight variation of wording.
